about_the_game:
Story

Deep beneath the earth, in streets choked by smoke and oil, the Iron Circle prepares for war. Day after day, the wretched factories of the Iron Circle churn out masked-soldiers and wicked weapons. Time is running out, and soon the Iron Circle shall march.

Play as Tobi - a chipper, heavy hittin' mercenary who works against the Iron Circle for a modest fee!

As you explore a lively world, you'll encounter heaps of helpful characters eager to aid in your affordably heroic efforts.

The Game


Smash and Bash: Fight against the machine using your fabulous fists of fury in fast, fluid action-combat. Dodge, jump, and combo your enemies until they are nothing but scrap!


Pick and Perfect: Customize your loadout from over 10 different abilities. Become a shotgun slinging bandit, an automatic missile platform, or even a close-quarters combat master. The choice is yours to make.


Move and Groove: Traverse a perilous world using all manner of devices. Ride down electrifying ziplines, swing off mechanical hooks, bounce off local flora or even off unsuspecting local florists.


Meet and Greet: Explore a world rife with riches and trinkets. Find new abilities to expand your arsenal, meet strange local folk and steal their ancient knick-knacks. In this world, might makes right and you are mighty right.

name: Tobi Topples Tyranny
short_description: Take a lovely stroll through a highly unstable police state. Strike it rich in a lawless wasteland. Pay respects to the elderly in glorious hand-to-hand combat! Prepare your circuits, adventure awaits!
